# Package Versions

```{r plot_packages_versions, warning=FALSE, comments="", message=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=7}
pkgs_all <- installed.packages()

get_install_date <- function(pkg) {
  desc_file <- system.file("DESCRIPTION", package = pkg)
  if (file.exists(desc_file)) {
    file.info(desc_file)$mtime
  } else {
    NA
  }
}

R_packages <- data.frame(
  Package     = pkgs_all[, "Package"],
  Version     = pkgs_all[, "Version"],
  InstallDate = as.POSIXct(sapply(pkgs_all[, "Package"], get_install_date),
                           origin = "1970-01-01")
)

R_packages <- R_packages[order(R_packages$InstallDate, decreasing = TRUE), ]

knitr::kable(head(R_packages, 20))

```
